description: Archaeology and Landscape in the Altai Mountains of Mongolia An Inventory and Research Guide for understanding the Cultural Landscapes of the Altai Mountains of Mongolia A Resource dedicated to the investigation of ancient Altai cultures through A digital archive of monuments Interactive maps for analyzing the distribution of monument typologies Texts, images, and maps for understanding the region, its physical character, its cultural history, and the interrelationships of monuments and landscape Support for this project was provided by the National Endowment for the Humanities, a federal agency. Any views, findings, conclusions or recommendations expressed in this website do not necessarily represent those of the National Endowment for the Humanities. home altai region archaeology image gallery cultural landscape the project Map Gallery Search Gazetteer Glossary Bibliography
title: Archaeology and Landscape in the Altai Mountains of Mongolia
